featured.text: Desert Bus for Hope is an annual week long event that raises money for Child's Play by playing the world's most boring video game 24/7. Viewers direct the action, talking via chat, asking questions during geek-celebrity interviews, and challenging them to sing, dance, and generally make fools of themselves in front of thousands of viewers. We also auction off unique and exciting prizes.

stream.game: Penn And Teller's Smoke And Mirrors

channel.game: Penn And Teller's Smoke And Mirrors
channel.name: desertbus
channel.description: The internet's longest running charity marathon, fundraising in support of Child's Play Charity. Since 2007 we've raised over $3.7 million for the children. Watch us play the worst game ever made, for your amusement.
